name: Bristle
headline: At-home oral health testing, coaching & care

founders.name: Brian Maurer, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder and commercial lead for Bristle. Background in Genomics sales and marketing (past: Illumina, Twist Bioscience). Passionate about translating advanced genomic technologies into healthcare solutions for patients and providers. 

Hobbies: All things music, hiking, science-fiction/self-help books, and travel

founders.name: Shivam Patel, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Bristle leading finance, ops, and partnerships

# Get personalized solutions for the problems in your mouth
Find & fix the root cause of oral conditions like bad breath, chronic tooth decay & gum inflammation with the world's first oral health saliva test.
Chronic bad breath
Inflamed gums
Oral thrush
Burning mouth syndrome
Gum recession
Weird tastes
[Start improving your oral health today](https://bristlehealth.com/<https:/www.bristlehealth.com/pages/products>)
**Join 10,000+ members**
![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0527/7574/7741/files/Group_279688_b1ba82e4-7858-4139-8df8-441fa78978b6.png?v=1682472276)

Identify and address the root cause of oral conditions
Oral health is rooted in your oral microbiome. Our at-home test measures 700+ bacteria, fungi and viruses in your saliva to detect issues early before they become problems. 
[Get your kit today](https://bristlehealth.com/<https:/www.bristlehealth.com/pages/products>)[Learn about the root cause of bad breath ](https://bristlehealth.com/<https:/www.bristlehealth.com/blogs/bad-breath-blogs/the-6-types-of-bad-breath-and-how-to-treat-them>)

# Loved by over 10,000 happy mouths
**4.84 out of 5 stars**
Join over 10,000 people taking control of their oral health
**Bristle goes that extra step to provide actionable advice** that will help you improve your oral health. You don’t want to just know what’s causing you to develop cavities or tooth decay. You want to know exactly what you can do to turn that around, and Bristle provides that, and more, for you.
![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0527/7574/7741/files/Mask_group_5ab95218-fc4f-4004-9e75-1794ca142c39.png?v=1682538396)
Chase
**Chronic bad breath has been bane of my life** for years and I've had no idea why! **Bristle was the first test to identify what was causing it and give me actionable steps I can take to fix it.** The coaching session was incredibly helpful for answering my questions and tailoring my care plan to my needs.
![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0527/7574/7741/files/Mask_group_89b973db-5b57-4278-a816-37f31d654af8.png?v=1682952827)
Thomas
When I took my second Bristle test six months later, my jaw dropped.**I haven’t had to have any work done at the dentist since I started down this new path** , just cleanings! It’s unbelievable!! I honestly can’t thank Bristle enough.
![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0527/7574/7741/files/Mask_group_3969f96f-f647-4f82-8381-082194a9f734.png?v=1682538797)
Wendy
It was extremely easy to send in the sample and I received my results quickly. **My coach reviewed my results in detail with me, offering up her suggestions as we went and choosing items that fit within my lifestyle.** I’m so happy to have stumbled across Bristle and can’t recommend it enough to others!
![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0527/7574/7741/files/Mask_group_f75b410f-9361-48d9-9919-aed7f47135ce.png?v=1682538951)
Kara

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0527/7574/7741/files/Mask_group_89b973db-5b57-4278-a816-37f31d654af8.png?v=1682952827)

See how you'll improve with Bristle
Sign up and receive a sample report
![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0527/7574/7741/files/Group_279422_76c83b0f-4a19-4252-ba5b-1d90799c093e.png?v=1680719415)
![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0527/7574/7741/files/Group_279422_76c83b0f-4a19-4252-ba5b-1d90799c093e.png?v=1680719415)
Good health starts with a healthy mouth
The oral microbiome is the complex ecosystem of bacteria, fungi, and more that lives inside your mouth. Some keep our teeth and gums healthy, while others cause damage and cause conditions like bad breath, tooth decay and gum disease. The latest research has also linked the oral microbiome to conditions like heart disease, Alzheimer’s and diabetes. Your oral microbiome is the foundation of your oral health. We help you identify and eliminate the harmful bacteria in your mouth to improve your oral and overall health.
[Learn the science](https://bristlehealth.com/<https:/bristlebio.myshopify.com/blogs/oral-microbiome/what-is-your-oral-microbiome>)
Developed in collaboration with dental leaders
Dr. Mark Burhenne
Functional Dentist & Founder of Askthedentist.com
“If you make one investment in your health this entire year, let this be it. The mouth is the gateway to your body and oral bacteria have been associated with a higher risk for systemic conditions including Alzheimer’s, diabetes, cardiovascular disease, and poor pregnancy outcomes. 
[_You_](https://bristlehealth.com/<http:/outcomes.You>) _can’t be healthy without a healthy mouth. And what you don’t measure, you cannot manage.”_
![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0527/7574/7741/files/image_3_07ccc2a3-7f89-4285-8771-ea20bd681faa.png?v=1680549794)

Good health starts with a healthy mouth
The oral microbiome is the complex ecosystem of bacteria, fungi, and more that lives inside your mouth. Some keep our teeth and gums healthy, while others cause damage and cause conditions like bad breath, tooth decay and gum disease. The latest research has also linked the oral microbiome to conditions like heart disease, Alzheimer’s and diabetes. Your oral microbiome is the foundation of your oral health. We help you identify and eliminate the harmful bacteria in your mouth to improve your oral and overall health.
Learn the science⟨26⟩
Developed in collaboration with dental leaders
Dr. Mark Burhenne
Functional Dentist & Founder of Askthedentist.com
“If you make one investment in your health this entire year, let this be it. The mouth is the gateway to your body and oral bacteria have been associated with a higher risk for systemic conditions including Alzheimer’s, diabetes, cardiovascular disease, and poor pregnancy outcomes. 
_You_⟨27⟩ _can’t be healthy without a healthy mouth. And what you don’t measure, you cannot manage.”_

generated_description:
**Bristle: Revolutionizing Oral Health**

Founded in 2020, Bristle is a San Francisco-based startup that's redefining how we think about oral health. As part of the Y Combinator W21 batch, the company is on a mission to provide at-home oral health testing, personalized coaching, and comprehensive care strategies. 

Bristle offers an innovative service that allows users to track the health of their mouths right from the comfort of their homes. Their flagship offering is an oral health test that analyzes saliva samples for an extensive range of bacteria, fungi, and viruses, helping users pinpoint issues like bad breath, gum inflammation, and chronic tooth decay. This is all about getting to the root of oral health problems before they escalate into serious conditions.

For just $169, customers receive a test kit that’s shipped directly to them, allowing for easy sample collection and return. Once analyzed, results are paired with actionable reports and support from certified oral hygiene coaches, who provide tailored advice and solutions based on individual needs.

With a lean team of six passionate individuals, Bristle is already making strides in the consumer health services and telemedicine sectors, embodying a robust vision for more personalized health management. They are led by Jared Friedman, a Group Partner within the Y Combinator ecosystem, which suggests a strong backing for their ambitious goals.

By leveraging the expertise of dental professionals and incorporating modern technology, Bristle not only aims to simplify identifying oral health issues but also to empower users with knowledge and personalized care plans. 

With over 10,000 satisfied members and an impressive 4.84-star rating, it seems Bristle is onto something. As we move toward a future where individual health management becomes the norm, Bristle is positioned as a trailblazer in the space of oral health. 

For those looking to take charge of their oral well-being, Bristle offers a compelling solution that combines scientific insight and everyday practicality—because good health really does start with a healthy mouth. You can learn more and check them out at [Bristle Health](https://bristlehealth.com/).
